document_data.name: Ondraer Chaserperi
document_data.mainbody: '''Ondraer Chaserperi''' was an entrepreneurial member of the [[Chaserperi]] family in the late mid-14{{th}} century.
document_data.Activities: He traded in objects made of [[ivory]]; his most notable wares were coffers, [[dice]], and "smooth-sweep" style furniture. He was also among the best known members of the [[Chaserperi]].
